column1: #Text=What are your thoughts on the Tea Party movement ?
#Text=I just recently read a Newsweek article about the Tea Party .
#Text=An excerpt that particularly caught my eye was : The Tea Party rejects the idea that “ ... a government of brainy people can solve thorny problems through complex legislation . "
